Properties

  • link
    hidden
    pathList: Listing<String>Source

    A list of files, directories, and wildcard patterns to cache and restore

  • expand_morelink
    path: StringSource

    A list of files, directories, and wildcard patterns to cache and restore

    To set as a Listing, use pathList.

  • link
    key: StringSource

    An explicit key for restoring and saving the cache

  • link
    hidden
    `restore-keys-list`: Listing<String>?Source

    An ordered multiline string listing the prefix-matched keys, that are used for restoring stale cache if no cache hit occurred for key. Note cache-hit returns false in this case.

  • expand_morelink
    `restore-keys`: String?Source

    An ordered multiline string listing the prefix-matched keys, that are used for restoring stale cache if no cache hit occurred for key. Note cache-hit returns false in this case.

    To set as a Listing, use restore-keys-list.

  • link
    `upload-chunk-size`: Int?Source

    The chunk size used to split up large files during upload, in bytes

  • expand_morelink
    enableCrossOsArchive: Boolean?Source

    An optional boolean when enabled, allows windows runners to save or restore caches that can be restored or saved respectively on other platforms

    Default if unspecified: "false"

  • expand_morelink
    `fail-on-cache-miss`: Boolean?Source

    Fail the workflow if cache entry is not found

    Default if unspecified: "false"

  • expand_morelink
    `lookup-only`: Boolean?Source

    Check if a cache entry exists for the given input(s) (key, restore-keys) without downloading the cache

    Default if unspecified: "false"

  • expand_morelink
    `save-always`: Boolean?Source
    Deprecated:

    save-always does not work as intended and will be removed in a future release. A separate actions/cache/restore step should be used instead. See https://github.com/actions/cache/tree/main/save#always-save-cache for more details.

    Run the post step to save the cache even if another step before fails

    Default if unspecified: "false"
